else if(y[i]=="7")board.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tile,{image:pawn_b,num:num,x:x[j],y:y[i]}));else if(x[j]=="a"&&y[i]=="8"||x[j]=="h"&&y[i]=="8")board.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tile,{image:rook_b,num:num,x:x[j],y:y[i]}));else if(x[j]=="b"&&y[i]=="8"||x[j]=="g"&&y[i]=="8")board.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tile,{image:knight_b,num:num,x:x[j],y:y[i]}));else if(x[j]=="c"&&y[i]=="8"||x[j]=="f"&&y[i]=="8")board.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tile,{image:bishop_b,num:num,x:x[j],y:y[i]}));else if(x[j]=="d"&&y[i]=="8")board.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tile,{image:queen_b,num:num,x:x[j],y:y[i]}));else if(x[j]=="e"&&y[i]=="8")board.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tile,{image:king_b,num:num,x:x[j],y:y[i]}));else if(x[j]=="a"&&y[i]=="1"||x[j]=="h"&&y[i]=="1")board.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tile,{image:rook_w,num:num,x:x[j],y:y[i]}));else board.push(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tile,{num:num,x:x[j],y:y[i]}));}}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"chessboard",children:board});};export default Chessboard;//{x[j]}{y[i]}
